description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.0JZU0FVnvAJ08fVR]{Paradigm Shift}

As a standard action, you can target a creature within 100 feet that was summoned with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} or transformed with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} and alter their form (Will negates). You transform this creature from their current form to another creature or form allowed by the spell of that spell level, though these creatures or forms must be drawn from the predetermined polymorph forms or predetermined summon creature forms selected by you or the caster. The creature retains this new form for the duration of the summon creature or polymorph spell. After you use this ability, you canâ€™t do so again until after you take a 10-minute rest to regain Stamina Points, though you can use it additional times by spending 1 Resolve Point per additional use.
